item.title: Kamie add a quote by Ambrose Bierce
item.description: "<b>Sweater</b>, n. Garment worn by child when its mother is feeling chilly." -- Ambrose Bierce

item.title: Kamie add a quote by Milton Berle
item.description: "If evolution really works, how come mothers only have two hands?" -- Milton Berle

item.title: Kamie add a quote by Robert Fulghum
item.description: "One of the very few reasons I had any respect for my mother when I was thirteen was because she would reach into the sink with her bare hands - bare hands - and pick up that lethal gunk and drop it into the garbage. To top that, I saw her reach into the wet garbage bag and fish around in there looking for a lost teaspoon. Bare hands - a kind of mad courage." -- Robert Fulghum

item.title: Kamie add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us." -- Bill Watterson
